website_summaries.verdict: A well-made retractable hose and reel that's impressive when it works as promised, but frustrating when it occasionally doesn't.
pros: Both reel and hose are made of strong, quality materials
Wall-mountable, and doesn't take up an excessive amount of space
Comes with a spray nozzle that has multiple settings to suit various needs
cons: Although the retracting mechanism works smoothly most of the time, it sometimes jams

customer_reviews.title: Does not wind back up
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product. It looks great. However, more than half the time, the hose will not wind up all the way. The last 6-8 feet never seem to be able to wind up inside the unit. We end up wrapping the hose around the whole box, which defeats the purpose of the retractable hose. I would've thought that maybe I received a bad one, but I actually received the wrong hose the first time (it was the longer hose) and it also did not wind up all the way.
customer_reviews.author: R. LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: Love the way Amazon processed the replacement and return immediately
customer_reviews.text: So I have another one on the way, but after spending about 30 minutes mounting the bracket, I attached to hose and it immediately started leaking internally. Very disappointing. I'm using this almost daily, so quality problems won't be tolerated. Love the way Amazon processed the replacement and return immediately, but it would have been better if it just worked out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far. My only concern is when you go to the GartenKraft web site it isn't even listed as a product they sell. I got the one with the 5/8 hose so there is no pressure loss. I hope it lasts as it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: John Gunnison

customer_reviews.title: Pulls out easy and retracts evenly
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for outside garage. Pulls out easy and retracts evenly. No leaks and tucks against the wall out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and works great. The real is smooth and easy to pull out and retract
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Schneider

customer_reviews.title: This hose is a perfect tool for watering
customer_reviews.text: This hose is a perfect tool for watering ! The retractable part is great. No more fighting with winding up or unwinding.. just pull it out where you want it then pull again and it retracts perfectly. You’ll be surprised. How good it is!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Saves your back!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, make sure you get the 5/8 unless you want a smaller hose
customer_reviews.author: Benji Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Not white
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these "white" hose reels to match my house, but it was tan, so I returned it. I immediately bought another one and it was also tan. It says it is white in the description, but it is definitely not white. I'm going back to UPS again and shipping the second one back tomorrow. I love Amazon and rarely have problems with purchases. So, I just purchased thus exact item from Target and it's still not white. This is a manufacturer issue.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I'd strongly recommend this to friends
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I'd strongly recommend this to friends, as I'm always getting comments on my hose reel from others. I love how easily it was to install and setup...I can easily reach all of my yard with it, and when I'm done give it a tug and drop it and winds up every time. I've seen other reviews on this hose reel, and people have had issues of leaking?...have never had that problem once! Great product. Will probably buy another for front yard now
customer_reviews.author: Rf

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as i hate unwinding a hose and messing with tangles and kinks as this product totally keeps it from doing that. Also great that you give it a nice little pull and it winds up perfect and if need be i can take off and store in tje garage and keep tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: rob becker

customer_reviews.title: Great product by a good company
customer_reviews.text: Great product by a good company. I have had one for over a year and it has not failed me once. Easy to mount to your wall all hardware included
customer_reviews.author: walter a salado

customer_reviews.title: Product broke and no response from Tacklife
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problems as others with a faulty unit. On mine the white guide that goes back and forth to roll the hose evenly stopped working. I tried emailing Tacklife customer support but never received a response. I've had it for 2 months so I don't think Amazon will take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Guido D Piquet

customer_reviews.title: Rolls up like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. If your like me I hate rolling up hose. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Recommend. We have one on our farm and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Recommend. We have one on our farm and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Hippen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Helps make gardening a breeze for me. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the hose real!!! Super easy to use makes watering garden and flowers a breeze!!!
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I don’t know how I lived without this in my life!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve ever used!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Best retractable hose I’ve used! & I’ve used lots.
customer_reviews.author: Logan & Hannah

product_meta.title: GartenKraft Retractable Garden Hose Reel, 1/2" 33'
product_meta.description: Size:1/2", 33'GartenKraft 33' retractable garden hose reel, 1/2" hose, patented slow Rewind technology, free locking system. Italian imported hose. Comes with multi-functional spray nozzle & mounting kit.
feature_bullets: Unit can be removed easily for storage with quick release mount and handle
Free lock to allow hose to stop at any desired length
Mounting brackets allow 180 Degree swivel, mounting kit included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
